data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Arillo, Antonio, Peñalver, Enrique, Delclòs, Xavier (2008): Microphorites (Diptera: Dolichopodidae) from the Lower Cretaceous amber of San Just (Spain), and the co-occurrence of two ceratopogonid species in Spanish amber deposits. Zootaxa 1920: 29-40, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.184689
